issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
After installation of "Appcelerator Studio 4.1.0" archive, with forced upgrade to "Appcelerator Studio 4.1.2", I am forced to order a free "Appcelerator Device Authorization" by E-Mail.

Authorization Code: *9660*
Authorization Code: *3694*
Authorization Code: *5280*

Both the first two codes were rejected, and you can be shure that I can enter 4 digits correctly.

Further tip for improvement: Tell the users that they must not enter the leading and following star "*" character.

But i did not fail due to the star character, I failed due to the right 4 digit authorization code. The third one .. worked :-).

You can be shure, I felt helpless with such given wrong activation codes... just to start a free IDE :-(.

Sincerely
Rolf
fields.summary: "Your Appcelerator Device Authorization" succeeded with the 3rd try :-(

comments.body:
Hello [~hemmerling],

Is it still an issue for you, please let us know.

Thanks.

I canÂ´t tell you, as my machine is now registered.
As I said, I succeeded by the 3rd try.

I will tell if I re-install the software on a different machine, if there should be the same problem.

Besides that the Appcelerator team should think about why I got 2 invalid codes ( maybe something is wrong with the code generator?? ).

Sincerely
Rolf
